Source code for services.web_ui.models.pad

'''
.. moduleauthor:: OS-Networks <info@os-networks.net>
'''

import uuid
from django.db import models 

def make_uuid():
    return str(uuid.uuid4())


[docs]class Pad(models.Model):
    uuid = models.CharField(max_length=36,  primary_key=True, default=make_uuid)
    slug = models.SlugField(editable=False, max_length=30)
    last_modified = models.DateTimeField(auto_now=True)
    data = models.TextField(blank=True)
    class Meta:
        verbose_name_plural = 'Pads'
        db_table = 'hwios_pads'
        app_label = 'no_fixture'
